message.content:
{
  "task_id": "avgo_brief_001",
  "user_prompt": "Build a mini brief for AVGO: price & % move, one positive and one negative headline summary (each ≤20 words), and a final 1-sentence risk note.",
  "complexity": "moderate",
  "max_turns": 6,
  "tools_available": [
    "polygon: polygon_get_aggs",
    "polygon: polygon_get_news",
    "fmp: fmp_get_quote",
    "fmp: fmp_get_income_statement",
    "fmp: fmp_get_company_profile",
    "tavily: tavily_search",
    "tavily: tavily_extract",
    "slack: send_slack_message",
    "slack: list_slack_channels",
    "python_execution: execute_python",
    "python_execution: process_mcp_data"
  ],
  "limits": {
    "max_tools": 5,
    "max_servers": 5
  },
  "tool_sequence": [
    {
      "step": 1,
      "server": "fmp",
      "tool": "fmp_get_quote",
      "params": {
        "symbol": "AVGO"
      },
      "analysis_requirements": {
        "extract": [
          "price",
          "changesPercentage",
          "volume"
        ],
        "compute": [
          "pct_move = changesPercentage",
          "quote = {\"price\": price, \"pct_move\": pct_move}"
        ],
        "select": [],
        "accept_if": [
          "price is not None",
          "changesPercentage is not None",
          "volume > 0"
        ],
        "next_args_from": "quote"
      }
    },
    {
      "step": 2,
      "server": "polygon",
      "tool": "polygon_get_news",
      "params": {
        "ticker": "AVGO",
        "limit": 20,
        "context_quote": "${quote}"
      },
      "analysis_requirements": {
        "extract": [
          "articles = results[]"
        ],
        "compute": [
          "articles_and_quote = {\"articles\": articles, \"quote\": context_quote}"
        ],
        "select": [],
        "accept_if": [
          "len(articles) > 0",
          "articles[0].title is not None"
        ],
        "next_args_from": "articles_and_quote"
      }
    },
    {
      "step": 3,
      "server": "python_execution",
      "tool": "execute_python",
      "params": {
        "script": "score_and_summarize_headlines.py",
        "input": "${articles_and_quote}"
      },
      "analysis_requirements": {
        "extract": [
          "positive_summary",
          "negative_summary",
          "pos_source",
          "neg_source"
        ],
        "compute": [
          "positive_summary = positive_summary.strip()",
          "negative_summary = negative_summary.strip()",
          "summaries = {\"positive_summary\": positive_summary, \"negative_summary\": negative_summary, \"pos_source\": pos_source, \"neg_source\": neg_source, \"quote\": articles_and_quote.quote}"
        ],
        "select": [],
        "accept_if": [
          "len(positive_summary) > 0",
          "len(negative_summary) > 0",
          "len(positive_summary.split()) <= 20",
          "len(negative_summary.split()) <= 20"
        ],
        "next_args_from": "summaries"
      }
    },
    {
      "step": 4,
      "server": "python_execution",
      "tool": "execute_python",
      "params": {
        "script": "assemble_brief.py",
        "input": "${summaries}"
      },
      "analysis_requirements": {
        "extract": [
          "brief_text",
          "price",
          "pct_move",
          "positive_summary",
          "negative_summary",
          "risk_note"
        ],
        "compute": [
          "price = summaries.quote.price",
          "pct_move = summaries.quote.pct_move",
          "positive_summary = summaries.positive_summary",
          "negative_summary = summaries.negative_summary",
          "risk_note = ''"
        ],
        "select": [],
        "accept_if": [
          "price is not None",
          "pct_move is not None",
          "len(positive_summary) > 0",
          "len(negative_summary) > 0"
        ],
        "next_args_from": ""
      }
    }
  ],
  "final_answer_requirements": {
    "format": "text",
    "must_include": [
      "price",
      "pct_move",
      "positive_summary",
      "negative_summary",
      "risk_note"
    ],
    "grounded_from": [
      "price",
      "pct_move",
      "positive_summary",
      "negative_summary",
      "risk_note"
    ],
    "quality_criteria": [
      "no hallucinations",
      "concise",
      "each summary ≤20 words",
      "risk note = single sentence"
    ]
  },
  "judge_rubric": {
    "weights": {
      "coverage": 0.4,
      "grounding": 0.3,
      "clarity": 0.2,
      "safety": 0.1
    },
    "target_length_range": [
      40,
      120
    ]
  }
}
